statements: SELECT * FROM medical_devices
SELECT device_name, manufacturer FROM medical_devices
SELECT device_id, device_name FROM medical_devices WHERE manufacturer = 'ABC Company'
SELECT * FROM medical_devices WHERE maintenance_schedule = 'monthly'
SELECT MAX(device_id), COUNT(device_id) FROM medical_devices
SELECT * FROM medical_devices WHERE manufacturer = 'ABC Company';
SELECT device_id, device_name FROM medical_devices ORDER BY device_id DESC;
SELECT device_name, manufacturer FROM medical_devices WHERE device_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200;
SELECT device_id, manufacturer FROM medical_devices WHERE maintenance_schedule LIKE '%monthly%';
SELECT * FROM medical_devices WHERE device_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY manufacturer ASC;
SELECT * FROM medical_devices
SELECT device_id, device_name FROM medical_devices
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM medical_devices WHERE device_type = 'MRI'
SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedules ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC
SELECT device_name, maintenance_date FROM medical_devices JOIN maintenance_schedules ON medical_devices.device_id = maintenance_schedules.device_id
SELECT * FROM medical_devices WHERE device_type = 'Heart Monitor' ORDER BY device_name ASC;
SELECT device_name, device_type, last_maintenance_date FROM medical_devices WHERE last_maintenance_date >= '2022-01-01';

SELECT device_name, maintenance_date, maintenance_notes FROM medical_devices JOIN maintenance_schedules ON medical_devices.device_id = maintenance_schedules.device_id WHERE maintenance_date < '2022-06-01';

SELECT device_name, device_type, maintenance_date FROM medical_devices LEFT JOIN maintenance_schedules ON medical_devices.device_id = maintenance_schedules.device_id WHERE maintenance_notes IS NOT NULL ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT COUNT(device_id) AS total_devices, device_type FROM medical_devices GROUP BY device_type HAVING COUNT(device_id) > 1;
SELECT * FROM medical_devices;
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM medical_devices;
SELECT device_name, last_maintenance_date FROM medical_devices ORDER BY last_maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE maintenance_notes IS NOT NULL;
SELECT personnel_name, personnel_role FROM maintenance_personnel;
SELECT * FROM medical_devices WHERE device_type = 'Pacemaker';
SELECT device_name, last_maintenance_date FROM medical_devices ORDER BY last_maintenance_date DESC;

SELECT medical_devices.device_name, maintenance_personnel.personnel_name FROM medical_devices JOIN maintenance_schedule ON medical_devices.device_id = maintenance_schedule.device_id JOIN maintenance_personnel ON maintenance_schedule.personnel_id = maintenance_personnel.personnel_id;
SELECT device_name, COUNT(schedule_id) AS maintenance_count FROM medical_devices LEFT JOIN maintenance_schedule ON medical_devices.device_id = maintenance_schedule.device_id GROUP BY device_name;

SELECT device_name, AVG(DATEDIFF(CURDATE(), last_maintenance_date)) AS avg_days_since_last_maintenance FROM medical_devices GROUP BY device_name HAVING AVG(DATEDIFF(CURDATE(), last_maintenance_date)) > 90;
SELECT * FROM medical_devices;
SELECT device_name, manufacturer FROM medical_devices WHERE purchase_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT device_name, manufacturer, purchase_date FROM medical_devices ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT schedule_date, technician_name FROM maintenance_schedules WHERE maintenance_type = 'Scheduled Maintenance';
SELECT * FROM maintenance_logs ORDER BY log_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM medical_devices;
SELECT device_name, manufacturer FROM medical_devices WHERE manufacturer='ABC Company';
SELECT device_name, purchase_date FROM medical_devices ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedules JOIN medical_devices ON maintenance_schedules.device_id = medical_devices.device_id;
SELECT technician_name, specialization FROM technicians WHERE specialization = 'Electronics';
SELECT * FROM medical_devices;
SELECT device_name, manufacturer FROM medical_devices;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_logs WHERE maintenance_type = 'Preventive Maintenace';
SELECT device_name, purchase_date FROM medical_devices ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT technician_name, technician_specialty FROM technicians WHERE technician_specialty = 'Cardiology';
SELECT * FROM medical_devices
SELECT device_name, manufacturer, purchase_date FROM medical_devices WHERE purchase_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT device_name, manufacturer, maintenance_schedule FROM medical_devices ORDER BY device_name DESC
SELECT * FROM maintenance_logs JOIN technicians ON maintenance_logs.technician = technicians.technician_name
SELECT device_name, maintenance_description FROM medical_devices JOIN maintenance_logs ON medical_devices.device_id = maintenance_logs.device_id WHERE maintenance_type = 'preventive'
